# Drug training

This website contains the content for the 'Drug Utilisation training' conducted as part of the *Health Data Sciences seminars sessions* on Friday 21st of November 2025.

-   [**Let's get started**](setup.qmd) contains the instructions to set up your environment so you can follow the session.
-   [**Drug Exposure Diagnostics**](ded.qmd) contains the presentation that will be conducted during the training.
-   [**Drug Utilisation**](dus.qmd) contains the presentation that will be conducted during the training.
